Team Updates


















 
Milana Cap

10:42 am on April 24, 2023 



Tags: docs ( 115 )   
				

Documentation Team Update – April 24, 2023


The Documentation team has a new meeting schedule:
First Tuesday in month – meeting 2-3PM UTC
Second Tuesday in month – issues triage 2-3PM UTC 
Third Tuesday in month – meeting 2-3PM UTC
Fourth Tuesday in month – Contributor DayContributor Day Contributor Days are standalone days, frequently held before or after WordCamps but they can also happen at any time. They are events where people get together to work on various areas of https://make.wordpress.org/ There are many teams that people can participate in, each with a different focus. https://2017.us.wordcamp.org/contributor-day/ https://make.wordpress.org/support/handbook/getting-started/getting-started-at-a-contributor-day/. 1-4PM UTC
Fifth Tuesday in month – not defined 2-3PM UTC (probably mixed meeting and triage)

Incorrect Image src on Twenty Twenty-Two theme doc page #797 opened 4 days ago
Code block backticks being converted causing display issues #796 opened 5 days ago
Delete Optimization page in HelpHub #795 opened last week
5 unresolved conversations:
Add distraction free writing article #793 commented on 4 days ago • 2 new comments
Move articles from Helphub to Devhub #388 commented on last week • 1 new comment
[DevHub] – Capabilities section of the register_post_type function reference has some incorrect capabilies #729 commented on last week • 1 new comment
Add Action and Filter Reference Documents to DevHub #370 commented on last week • 1 new comment
[HelpHub] Post Author block #695 commented on 4 days ago • 1 new comment

About This Blog

This blog is used by for project-wide communication and collaboration. Cross-team coordination is managed here through weekly team updates, posts from leadership, and public discussion of topics that relate to many teams. For external communication and information, visit WordPress News.Upcoming Meetings (Make Network Updates)About Team RepsProject Digests
